alert.note: Alert for Bent; Kiowa; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 06 at 10:33PM MDT until July 07 at 12:30AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM MDT FRIDAY FOR EASTERN BENT, CENTRAL KIOWA AND WESTERN PROWERS COUNTIES... At 1033 PM MDT, Media reported flash flooding occuring in and around the Lamar area. Highway 287 was reported to be impassable due to high water. Additional thunderstorms producing heavy rain were occurring in Kiowa county and were moving south-southeast towards Lamar. 1 to 2 inches of rain has fallen and an additional 1 to 2 inches of rain will be possible HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Media reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Lamar, Eads, Wiley, Haswell, McClave, Hasty, Neegronda Reservoir, John Martin Reservoir, Sweetwater Reservoir, Queens Reservoir, Neeoshe Reservoir, Blue Lake, Caddoa and Fort Lyon. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
